system.damageOrEffect: Creatures with Psy Rating that are damaged by this ammo reduce their Psy Rating by 1 for 1d10 Rounds, effect stacks. During this time target cannot Push their Psychic Powers and targets with Warp Instability Trait must immediately make a Willpower test for it.

description.value: Damage/Effect: Creatures with Psy Rating that are damaged by this ammo reduce their Psy Rating by 1 for 1d10 Rounds, effect stacks. During this time target cannot Push their Psychic Powers and targets with Warp Instability Trait must immediately make a Willpower test for it.
